::Prowl/Striker::

Prowl runs out of the Ark. Looking around and choosing an opponent, he fires 
an acid pellet at Manterror.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Striker groans and opens his eyes. He turns his head and looks around. It 
seemed he was laying on his back on something blue that he couldn't feel, 
staring into something whitish that he could feel pressing against his 
stomach.

His systems realign themselves and he realizes that he in laying on his 
stomach. He rolls over and sits up. He looks around again. He was on some 
sort of beach. How he got there he had no idea. The last thing he could 
remember before waking up was falling out of a cave while slashing at Zenyak.

He struggles to his feet and sets off toward the mountains he had been washed 
ashore near.
